body.p: For the following scenario, is the variable is categorical or quantitative?
A poll of students at your college is asked how many hours they work at a job while in school.

response.feedback: Incorrect. The variable in this case is the number of hours spent working at a job, which is a quantitative variable. Categorical variables classify individuals into categories.
Correct. The variable in this case is the number of hours spent working at a job, which is a quantitative variable.

body.p: For the following scenario, is the variable is categorical or quantitative?
A poll of students at your college is asked whether or not they plan to attend graduate school after graduation.

response.feedback: Correct. The variable in this case is whether or not a student plans to attend graduate school, which is categorical.
Incorrect. The variable in this case is whether or not a student plans to attend graduate school, which is categorical.
